revisions.*: Because "rvslots" was not specified, a legacy format has been used for the output. This format is deprecated, and in the future the new format will always be used.

[[Category:Crafting]]
__TOC__


The [[Legendary Hammer|legendary hammer]] is made by combining ten(10) ancient hammer shards. The shards are dropped as loot in:

* [[Random Dungeon Adventure|Random Dungeon Adventures]] (RDA)
* Select monsters in [[Covetous]] Level 4 
* Select monsters in [[Ice Dungeon]] Level 3
* Gargoyle Alchemists

'''The shards are combined by double clicking and targeting other shards.''' 

''Note: Since there is no way to tell how many shards have been combined, it is wise to delay combining until you acquire all ten(10).''
